org.openntf.domino.ext

Interface DbDirectory

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DbDirectory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DbDirectory

    public interface DbDirectory
    Author:
    withersp OpenNTF extensions to DbDirectory class

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DbDirectory.Type getDirectoryType()
      Type of database the DbDirectory is, using DbDirectory.Type enum.
      Database getFirstDatabase(DbDirectory.Type type)
      Deprecated. 
      DbDirectoryTree getTree()
      Returns a tree datastructure, so that you easily can navigate through several directories
      DbDirectoryTree getTree(DbDirectory.Type type)
      Returns a tree datastructure for a certain type, so that you easily can navigate through several directories
      boolean isSortByLastModified()
      Whether or not the DbDirectory is sorted by Last Modified.
      void setDirectoryType(DbDirectory.Type type)
      Sets the type of database the DbDirectory is, using DbDirectory.Type enum.
      void setSortByLastModified(boolean value)
      Re-sorts the DbDirectory by Last Modified date or clears that sorting

    • Method Detail

      • getFirstDatabase

        @Deprecated
Database getFirstDatabase(DbDirectory.Type type)
        Deprecated. 
        Deprecated, use Collection.iterator() instead to loop through databases in the Directory
        Parameters:
        type - Type database type, e.g. Database, Template, Template_Candidate etc
        Returns:
        Database of type passed in
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 1.0.0

      • isSortByLastModified

        boolean isSortByLastModified()
        Whether or not the DbDirectory is sorted by Last Modified. Use setSortByLastModified(boolean) to sort the DbDirectory by last modified date
        Returns:
        boolean, if sorted on last modified
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 4.5.0

      • setSortByLastModified

        void setSortByLastModified(boolean value)
        Re-sorts the DbDirectory by Last Modified date or clears that sorting
        Parameters:
        value - boolean whether to sort on Last Modified date or not
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 4.5.0

      • getDirectoryType

        DbDirectory.Type getDirectoryType()
        Type of database the DbDirectory is, using DbDirectory.Type enum. The default is TEMPLATE_CANDIDATE
        Returns:
        org.openntf.domino.DbDirectory.Type of the database
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 4.5.0

      • setDirectoryType

        void setDirectoryType(DbDirectory.Type type)
        Sets the type of database the DbDirectory is, using DbDirectory.Type enum. The default is TEMPLATE_CANDIDATE
        Parameters:
        type - org.openntf.domino.DbDirectory.Type enum instance
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 4.5.0

      • getTree

        DbDirectoryTree getTree()
        Returns a tree datastructure, so that you easily can navigate through several directories
        Returns:
        a DbDirectoryTree

      • getTree

        DbDirectoryTree getTree(DbDirectory.Type type)
        Returns a tree datastructure for a certain type, so that you easily can navigate through several directories
        Parameters:
        type - the type
        Returns:
        a DbDirectoryTree
